doc.field: i know, i know, oprah is quitting her tv show. i know but did you hear about the totally awesome geeky investigation into the last mystery of watergate? it's our moment of geek. it's coming right up. stay tuned. it will make a better future for our children. general brent snowcroft: because climate change threatens our national security. rev. c. douglas smith: we have a responsibility to protect god's creation.
